long_description: The REI Quarter Dome 3 Tent uses new ultralight materials and a unique pole design to create a lightweight 3-person, 3-season backpacking tent that's roomy, well ventilated and strong. Our new 15-denier ripstop nylon in the tent and fly minimizes weight, yet retains strength; floor uses a lightweight yet robust 30-denier ripstop nylon. REI-exclusive tension-truss architecture creates stable vertical sidewalls and generous headroom while minimizing pole weight. Pole angles and asymmetrical tent shape also enhance living space, allowing you to sit up comfortably. 2 vestibules provide covered storage on each side; doors on fly and tent are aligned for easy entry and exit. Third vestibule at the head of the tent provides easily accessed covered storage for the center sleeper. A single hubbed pole assembly allows quick, easy setup. A large zippered roof vent helps control condensation. Pockets and hang loops help organize the interior. The REI Quarter Dome 3 Tent comes with a compression stuff sack, stakes, guylines and tighteners, as well as a pole-repair tube, a pole bag and a stake bag. Fly/footprint minimalist pitch option lets you leave the tent at home and use the fly, poles and footprint (sold separately) as a lightweight shelter. The REI Quarter Dome 3 Footprint is sold separately.
short_description: The REI Quarter Dome 3 Tent uses new ultralight materials and a unique pole design to create a lightweight 3-person, 3-season backpacking tent that's roomy, well ventilated and strong.
